description: Do you like perfect matches in fashion?From now on, your beautiful Watch will always fit your cloths!Just choose the color and impress your friends!Features:- clock type (digital / analog),- date,- multiple color schemes (10),- battery life indicator,- great looking ambient mode,- customization - built-in settings.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
descriptionHTML:
Do you like perfect matches in fashion?
From now on, your beautiful Watch will always fit your cloths!

Just choose the color and impress your friends!

Features:
- clock type (digital / analog),
- date,
- multiple color schemes (10),
- battery life indicator,
- great looking ambient mode,
- customization - built-in settings.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
comments: 12 hour format Would be nice to be able to select 12 hour format. Bigger text too.
